lyric:
[by:FaNTasy_Maze]
[ti:Bella Ciao]
[ar:Chumbawamba]
[al:Singsong and a Scrap]
[by:FaNTasy_Maze]
[00:00.68]The world is waking outside my window
[00:05.13]Bella ciao, bella ciao, bella ciao ciao ciao
[00:10.52]Drags my senses into the sunlight
[00:15.02]For there are things that I must do
[00:20.20]Wish me luck now, I have to leave you
[00:25.10]Bella ciao, bella ciao, bella ciao ciao ciao
[00:30.03]With my friends now up to the city
[00:34.78]We're going to shake the gates of hell
[00:39.87]And I will tell them - We will tell them
[00:45.07]Bella ciao, bella ciao, bella ciao ciao ciao
[00:50.06]That our sunlight is not for franchise
[00:54.60]And wish the bastards drop down dead
[00:59.62]Next time you see me, I may be smiling
[01:04.78]Bella ciao, bella ciao, bella ciao ciao ciao
[01:09.22]I'll be in prison or on the TV
[01:14.21]I'll say, "The sunlight dragged me here!"
[01:19.33]Questa mattina mi son svegliato
[01:24.33]O bella ciao, bella ciao, bella ciao
[01:32.40]
tlyric:
[by:EizoAuditoreDF]
[00:00.68]世界在我的窗外醒来
[00:05.13]姑娘再见吧，再见吧，再见吧
[00:10.52]我的身体被阳光唤醒
[00:15.02]因为还有事情需要我去做
[00:20.20]祝愿我好运吧，但我必须要离开你
[00:25.10]姑娘再见吧，再见吧，再见吧
[00:30.03]我和朋友要去到城里
[00:34.78]我们将要敲开地狱的大门
[00:39.87]我要告诉他们，我们将要告诉他们
[00:45.07]姑娘再见吧，再见吧，再见吧
[00:50.06]我们的阳光属于自己
[00:54.60]祝愿那些混蛋们早日死掉
[00:59.62]下次我们相见，我可能会露出笑容
[01:04.78]姑娘再见吧，再见吧，再见吧
[01:09.22]也许会在监狱里或是在电视上
[01:14.21]我会说：“是阳光将我引领至此”
[01:19.33]今天早上我从梦中醒来
[01:24.33]哦姑娘再见吧，再见吧，再见吧
